author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond: New Cliff Edge Worries Post-Brexit
text: To subscribe to the newsletter, please sign up here MUST READS Britain and the EU Are Pulling Back From the Cliff—For Now: Fears have receded that economic relations between Britain and the European Union will fall off a cliff edge in 11 months’ time when the U.K. leaves the bloc.
